<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Air Mephit](/Monsters.aspx?ID=192)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Air mephits are capricious and flighty relative to their kin; they are as likely to fly blindly into battle as they are to whine in terror at a loud noise. They are pale blue in coloration and have thin wings that trail small puffs of vapor as they fly through the skies.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Elemental](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 15

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Mephit_WaterMephit.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Air Mephit](/Monsters.aspx?ID=192)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Air" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=5" />
<trait label="Elemental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=57" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 150</row>

**Perception** +3; darkvision

**Languages**
[Auran](/Languages.aspx?ID=15)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +7, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +7

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +1

**Dex** +4

**Con** +0

**Int** -2

**Wis** +0

**Cha** +0
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 16 

**Fort** +3 

**Ref** +19 

**Will** +7 

</row>

**HP** 12
([fast healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=15) 2 (in open air))

**Immunities**
bleed, paralyzed, poison, sleep

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet, fly 40 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +9 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d6+1 slashing

**Arcane Innate Spells** DC 17
- **1st**
[Gust of Wind](/Spells.aspx?ID=143)
- **2nd**
[Blur](/Spells.aspx?ID=28)

**Breath Weapon** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Air](/Traits.aspx?ID=5), [Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11)) The air mephit breathes sand and grit in a 15-foot cone that deals 2d6 slashing damage to each creature within the area (DC 17 basic Reflex save). The air mephit can’t use Breath Weapon again for 1d4 rounds.

</column>
